org.rdkit.knime.headers

Class HeaderPropertyHandlerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.headers.HeaderPropertyHandlerRegistry

  • public class HeaderPropertyHandlerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class manages all handlers that can handle header properties and visualize them in the RDKit Interactive View.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PREF_KEY_HANDLERS_DISABLED
      The preference key that stores a semicolon separated list of handlers that are disabled.
      static java.lang.String PREF_KEY_HANDLERS_RENDERING_HEADERS
      The preference key that stores a semicolon separated list of handlers for tooltip renderings.
      static java.lang.String PREF_KEY_HANDLERS_RENDERING_TOOLTIPS
      The preference key that stores a semicolon separated list of handlers for tooltip renderings.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllHeaderPropertyHandlers

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getAllHeaderPropertyHandlers()
        Returns all found header property handlers available in the registry.
        Returns:
        Array with handlers or null, if none is registered.

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlers

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getHeaderPropertyHandlers(java.lang.String[] arrHandlerIds)
        Returns all header property handlers available in the registry for the passed in IDs in the very order as past in.
        Parameters:
        arrHandlerIds - Array with IDs. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Array with handlers or null, if none is found for the specified IDs.

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlers

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getHeaderPropertyHandlers(java.lang.String strHandlerIdList)
        Returns all header property handlers available in the registry for the passed in IDs that are represented as a semicolon separated list.
        Parameters:
        strHandlerIdList - String with semicolon separated list with IDs. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Array with handlers or null, if none is found for the specified IDs.

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlersForProperty

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getHeaderPropertyHandlersForProperty(java.lang.String strProperty)
        Returns all header property handlers that are capable of handling the specified property.
        Parameters:
        strProperty -
        Returns:

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlersForColumn

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getHeaderPropertyHandlersForColumn(DataColumnSpec colSpec,
                                                                  java.lang.String strHandlerIdList)
        Returns all header property handlers that should be involved in rendering the column header of the specified column specification. A handler will only appear in the array, if the column contains properties that can be rendered (a handler is registered) and if the representation mode is set to HeaderAndTooltip or HeaderOnly. Every handler is only added once to the set of handlers.
        Parameters:
        colSpec - Data column specification with properties to be evaluated for rendering.
        strHandlerIdList - String with semicolon separated list with IDs. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An ordered array of handlers that shall be invoked for rendering properties. Returns null, if no handler is needed.

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlersForColumn

        public HeaderPropertyHandler[] getHeaderPropertyHandlersForColumn(DataColumnSpec colSpec,
                                                                  java.lang.String[] arrHandlerIds)
        Returns all header property handlers that should be involved in rendering the column header of the specified column specification. A handler will only appear in the array, if the column contains properties that can be rendered (a handler is registered) and if the representation mode is set to HeaderAndTooltip or HeaderOnly. Every handler is only added once to the set of handlers.
        Parameters:
        colSpec - Data column specification with properties to be evaluated for rendering.
        handlerIds - Ordered array of handlers that shall be considered for rendering. The result will be a subset of them or null. Can be null to try to use all registered handlers.
        Returns:
        An ordered array of handlers that shall be invoked for rendering properties. Returns null, if no handler is needed.

      • getHeaderPropertyHandlerById

        public HeaderPropertyHandler getHeaderPropertyHandlerById(java.lang.String strId)
        Returns the header property handler with the specified ID or null, if not found.
        Parameters:
        strId -
        Returns:
        Header property handler with the specified ID or null.

      • getDefaultColumnHeaderRenderers

        public java.lang.String getDefaultColumnHeaderRenderers()
        Creates a default list string of handler IDs that shall be involved in rendering column headers. This information is derived from all default representation modes of the registered handlers. The order is arbitrary.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getColumnHeaderRenderers

        public java.lang.String getColumnHeaderRenderers()
        Returns the current list string of handler IDs that shall be involved in rendering column headers. This information is taken from the preference store.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getDefaultColumnTooltipRenderers

        public java.lang.String getDefaultColumnTooltipRenderers()
        Creates a default list string of handler IDs that shall be involved in rendering column tooltips. This information is derived from all default representation modes of the registered handlers. The order is arbitrary.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getColumnTooltipRenderers

        public java.lang.String getColumnTooltipRenderers()
        Returns the current list string of handler IDs that shall be involved in rendering column tooltips. This information is taken from the preference store.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getDefaultDisabledColumnRenderers

        public java.lang.String getDefaultDisabledColumnRenderers()
        Creates a default list string of handler IDs that shall NOT be involved in rendering column headers and tooltips. This information is derived from all default representation modes of the registered handlers. The order is arbitrary.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getDisabledColumnRenderers

        public java.lang.String getDisabledColumnRenderers()
        Returns the current list string of handler IDs that are disabled. This information is taken from the preference store.
        Returns:
        List.

      • findDataValueRendererFactory

        public DataValueRendererFactory findDataValueRendererFactory(java.lang.String strFactoryId)
        Tries to find the data value renderer factory with the specified ID. For fast access it will cache the information.
        Parameters:
        strFactoryId - Factory ID to search for. Can be null to return null.
        Returns:
        Data value renderer factory or null, if not found.

      • getInstance

        public static HeaderPropertyHandlerRegistry getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the registry. If it does not exist yet it will be created and filled with information about available extension points.
        Returns:
        Registry instance.
